alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 14 at 3:17AM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR HIGH WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 011, 012, 025, AND 102... The National Weather Service in Kansas City/Pleasant Hill has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 025 and 102.Fire weather zones 001, 002, 011, and 012. * WIND...Southerly winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts as high as 65 mph expected. * HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated thunderstorms are possible Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
